name: In the clouds (bobost2)
description:
Your character has fallen in the battle between Heaven and Hell. He gets respawned at the front heaven gates with only his armor, but not his fighting equipment. In this game your character is trying to collect money by doing deliveries and races to get some new equipment and return to the battlefields.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Shift - Run

Space - Jump

F - Interact

Made with Unreal Engine 5.0.3 for the Epic's MegaJam 2022
